casebody.data:
James M. HERRINGTON v. CITY OF RIDGELAND, Mississippi. No. 57386. Supreme Court of Mississippi. Dec. 9, 1987. W.E. Gore, Jr., Thomas J. Lowe, Jr., Jackson, for appellant. Steve H. Smith, Smith & Case, Ridge-land, for appellee.

Rehearing Denied Feb. 3, 1988.

Before HAWKINS, P.J., and PRATHER and SULLIVAN, JJ. AFFIRMED.
